attributes.action: enable registration signatures "against" as well as "for" on motions on this web site.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe this would give a more balanced view of opinions. Government could then take more notice of the "Silent Majority" and no need for motions to the contrary on the web site.

rejection.details: We will treat this siggestion as feedback.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
